reporter_caption.center: BRADLEY CONTRACTING COMPANY v. CITY OF NEW YORK, 186 App. Div. 884 (1918)

caption.center: BRADLEY CONTRACTING COMPANY, Appellant, v. THE CITY OF NEW YORK,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order reversed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements, and motion denied, with ten dollars costs. No opinion.
